roleset.name: adapt

example.name: the one example
example.text: Hard-hitting consultants match ads with Mr. Courter's team, and Mr. Florio retools himself as the lean, mean Democratic fighting machine of the 1990s.
example.arg: as the lean, mean Democratic fighting machine of the 1990s.

roleset.note: RETOOL-V NOTES: Could be [mis|re]interpreted as 'characterize'. (from retool.01-v)
